Package library.borrow

Class BorrowManager

java.lang.Object
library.borrow.BorrowManager
public class BorrowManager extends Object
Manages borrow operations in the library, including borrowing media, checking overdue items, calculating fines, and listing borrows.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Alaa, Jana
